short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lot and position size calculator for forex traders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Position Size Calculator is the ultimate tool for risk-averse traders. It lets you define your trading goals and quickly calculate the optimal position size for any instrument, preserving your capital and helping you stay in the game longer. With its intuitive design and flexible settings, Position Size Calculator makes managing your risk easier than ever before!
